sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Health in All Policies Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Health in All Policies Act.

sections.heading: Definition.  In this Act, "health in all policies framework" means a public health framework through which policymakers and stakeholders in the public and private sectors use a collaborative approach to improve health outcomes and reduce health inequities in the State by incorporating health conside
sections.text: Definition. In this Act, "health in all policies framework" means a public health framework through which policymakers and stakeholders in the public and private sectors use a collaborative approach to improve health outcomes and reduce health inequities in the State by incorporating health considerations into decision-making across sectors and policy areas.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2020.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2020.
